sentences.en: A contractor bidding for a construction is required to prepare many bid documents.
sentences.cn: 参与建筑工程投标的承包商要准备许多投标文件.

sentences.en: Ask a contractor to estimate for the repair of the building.
sentences.cn: 请一位包工估计一下修这个楼得花多少钱.

sentences.en: Before SARA, there were numerous disputes about recoverability of contractor costs, enforcement costs, and even interest.
sentences.cn: 在《最高基金修正与再授权法案》之前, 有无数关于合同费用的追究效力问题 、 执行费用问题, 甚至利息问题的争论.

sentences.en: But the labour contractor is not afraid of nightmares.
sentences.cn: 但是带工老板是不怕做恶梦的!

sentences.en: I asked a contractor to estimate for the repair of the house.
sentences.cn: 我请了承包商估计修缮这幢房子的费用.

sentences.en: It criticises the main contractor for seriously erring in its original estimates.
sentences.cn: 它批评主要承包商在其最初估价中犯了严重的错误。
我的公司承包了这项工程.

sentences.en: The construction quality of contractor shall be approved in written by client.
sentences.cn: 承包人的施工质量须得到发包人的书面认可.

sentences.en: The engineer contractor will set up the minimum specifications.
sentences.cn: 工程师订合同者要规定最低的技术要求.

sentences.en: The style of house the contractor builds depends partly on the lay of the land.
sentences.cn: 承包商所建房屋的式样,有几分要看地势而定.

sentences.en: The Sub - Contractor shall adopt the most expedient method of working or construction.
sentences.cn: 分包 商应当采用最适宜的工作或施工方法.

sentences.en: The Tokyo contractor was asked to kick $ 6000 back as commission.
sentences.cn: 那个东京的承包商被要求退还6000美元作为佣金.

sentences.en: To be responsible for sub - contractor's and supplier's assessment and evaluation.
sentences.cn: 负责外委商和供应商评估和评价.

sentences.en: To make the contract attractive, the contractor subtracted a tractor from it.
sentences.cn: 为了使合同有吸引力, 承包商从中减去了一台拖拉机.

sentences.en: We get estimate from three different contractor before accepting the lowest.
sentences.cn: 我们得到三个承包商的报价后,接受了价钱最低的.

sentences.en: We told the building contractor that we wanted a garage big enough for two cars.
sentences.cn: 我们告诉建筑承包商，我们想要一个可以停放两辆汽车的车库。

words.tran_cn: 合约地；合同性地；契约规定地

trans.tran_en: a person or company that agrees to do work or provide goods for another company
